name: Stupid Aliens!
description:
Stupid Aliens!

The Aliens have gone mad! They ate the mushrooms and started killing everyone! They were even killing each other! Luckily, before they went crazy, they interfaced the crystal skulls and loaded our DNA.

Go to the mothership and find the crystal skulls to save the people! Some crystal skulls belong to very important people with valuable knowledge.

Find the crystal skulls to save humanity! If you don't find them all, humanity will be doomed!

Stupid Aliens! is a fast paced, challenging action platformer! You will encounter many hazards and obstacles along the way while you try to find the crystal skulls. Collect gems to purchase energy drink power-ups or to restore your health.

Supported Controllers Keyboard

 Move Left

Move Right

Crouch /Aim Low

Aim High

 Jump

Shoot

 Action 1: Take Gun

Action 2: Door, Health, Switch, Vending Machine, Spring

 Locate Hero

 Zoom Out

Custom Input Mapping

You can customize the input mapping under Controls from the Options menu or when starting a new game from the Intro screen.
